body:
Our software compiled into 386, run on Windows X64 VM, when go1.4.2, have never seen this exception.After upgrading to go1.5, running a few days later, suddenly system process downtime.After check the log, according to the error information Google to test cases.Personally, I think the problem with some accidental, we continued to observe, at present unable to reproduce the error.

I'm sorry, my English level is very poor.
